results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በወላጂም በወለዳቸውም ሰዎች (በአዳምና በዘሮቹ ሁሉ እምላለሁ)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ሰውን ሁሉ በእርግጥ በልፋት ውስጥ ኾኖ ፈጠርነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእርሱ ላይ አንድም የማይችል መኾኑን ይጠረጥራልን?
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
